title: Injured Little Leaguer has increased face swelling limiting his vision, doctors say
description: The injured Little League player who fractured his skull after falling from his bunk bed on Monday continues to face challenges in his recovery, including swelling that may block his vision.

title: New satellite images debunk Putin's claim about nuclear plant
description: New satellite images from Maxar Technologies of the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant show no signs of "systemic shelling," despite claims by Russian president Vladimir Putin that the Ukrainian military was conducting repeated military strikes at the plant.

title: Mexican court issues 83 arrest warrants related to the disappearance of 43 students
description: A court in Mexico on Friday ordered the arrest warrants of 83 people allegedly involved in the 2014 disappearance of 43 students, the prosecutor's office said in a statement.

title: Britain is plunging deeper into crisis by the day, but its government is missing in action
description: The United Kingdom is enduring a summer of misery as its beloved health service descends into crisis, inflation soars, taps run dry and strikes halt trains. Meanwhile, the government is nowhere to be seen.

title: Sean Connery's own 'James Bond car' sold for $2.4 million
description: A silver Aston Martin DB5 that had been owned by actor Sean Connery was sold at auction Thursday for $2.4 million.

title: Ukrainian grain deal 'lays groundwork for permanent peace environment,' says Turkey
description: Some 27 ships loaded with grain have left Ukraine's Black Sea ports since August 1 under an export deal brokered by the United Nations and Turkey, which has laid "the groundwork for a permanent peace environment," Turkey's Defense Minister said in a speech on Saturday.

title: Scientists want to resurrect the extinct Tasmanian tiger
description: Where would we be without dreams?

title: 'Prolific rainfall and widespread flash flooding' threaten nearly 10 million people across the Southwest
description: Nearly 10 million people across Arizona, New Mexico and western Texas are under flood watches Saturday, including Phoenix, Albuquerque and El Paso.

title: This luxury car maker is switching to hybrids, but offers one last gas-powered stunner
description: Bugatti-Rimac CEO Mate Rimac says all future Bugatti models will be hybrids. The Mistral is the company's first convertible based on the Bugatti Chiron.

title: Mitch McConnell is right. Senate Republicans have a candidate problem.
description: We've become used to displays of braggadocio by politicians (see former President Donald Trump). That's why it's notable when a politician admits that the political winds might not be going their way.

title: Why QR-code menus are still around
description: Of all the pandemic-inspired business adoptions, perhaps none is as reviled as the QR-code menus. And yet, it persists.

title: Lengthening a woman's fertility may extend her life as well, research finds
description: One organ in a woman's body ages more than twice as fast as all other tissues, wreaking havoc with both fertility and long-term health.

title: Daniil Medvedev and Stefanos Tsitsipas defeat American big hitters to reach Cincinnati Open semifinals
description: World No. 1 Daniil Medvedev and fourth seed Stefanos Tsitsipas defused big-serving American threats Taylor Fritz and John Isner on Friday to reach the semifinals of the Cincinnati Open.

title: Cryptocurrency has been touted as the key to building Black wealth. But critics are skeptical
description: Samson Williams was working in the mortgage lending industry in 2014 when a colleague convinced him to invest in cryptocurrency.

title: Why Jaws and E.T. are back in theaters
description: In Hollywood, there's the reboot, the remake and the requel. But now, coming this summer to a theater near you: the re-release.

title: A partial foot in a shoe was discovered in one of Yellowstone's deepest hot springs
description: A partial foot inside a shoe was found floating in one of the deepest hot springs in Yellowstone Park, prompting an investigation by the National Park Service.

title: Manchester United seal transfer deal for Real Madrid midfielder Casemiro
description: Manchester United has reached an agreement with Real Madrid to sign Brazil midfielder Casemiro, the English Premier League side announced on Friday.

title: My mother's walk through life with polio
description: My mother never got to buy shoes. At least not in that obsessive, stereotypically female way we see in shows like Sex and the City.

title: A second wildland firefighter has died this month battling blazes in Oregon
description: A 25-year-old wildland firefighter was killed after being struck by a tree while battling the Rum Creek Fire in Oregon, officials said Friday, marking the second fire personnel death in the state this month.

title: How 6 of world's drying rivers look from space
description: ● Israel is pumping water from the Med to refill a lake

title: Oklahoma, with a history of botched lethal injections, prepares to start executing a man a month
description: Oklahoma will soon begin executing death row inmates at a pace of about one man per month, with plans to put to death 25 prisoners over the next two years despite cries by critics and experts who point not only to outstanding questions of the mental fitness or possible innocence of some but also the state's recent history of botched lethal injections.

title: Ten months after the 'Rust' shooting, Alec Baldwin says he still thinks about it every day
description: Alec Baldwin says he doesn't believe he or anyone else will face criminal charges in the fatal shooting last year on the "Rust" movie set -- a tragic episode he says "has taken years off" his life and has cost him professionally.

title: Bugatti reveals its last gas-only car
description: Bugatti has unveiled what the French automaker hopes will be the world's fastest convertible. The 1,600-horsepower, $5 million W16 Mistral is, essentially, an open-topped version of the Bugatti Chiron supercar, though there are major design differences.

title: Shark could have eaten an orca in five bites
description: Faster than any shark alive today and big enough to eat an orca in just five bites: A new study suggests the extinct shark known as a megalodon was an even more impressive superpredator than scientists realized before.

title: Boxer Ramla Ali looks to break barriers in Saudi Arabia's first ever female fight
description: After fleeing war in Somalia as a child, featherweight boxer Ramla Ali has had to fight for everything she has.

title: Florida officials seize $12.8 million worth of drugs, arrest 85 people
description: Eighty-five suspects were arrested and over $12.8 million in drugs were confiscated in a two-year undercover drug trafficking investigation, the Polk County Sheriff's Office said on Friday.

title: Former attorney general of Mexico arrested in disappearance of 43 students
description: The former attorney general of Mexico was arrested on Friday in relation to the 2014 disappearance of 43 students, a tragedy that captured the world's attention nearly eight years ago.
